de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.common
Interface Component

All Known Subinterfaces:
Application, ContentStorage, DHTNode, DistributionStrategy, NetLayer, OverlayNode, SupportOperations, TransLayer, UnstructuredOverlay
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractApplication, AbstractNetLayer, AbstractOverlayNode, BTClientApplication, BTPeerDistributeNode, BTPeerSearchNode, BTTrackerApplication, BTTrackerNode, ClientNode, DefaultContentStorage, DefaultTransLayer, DistributionStrategyImpl, ExtendedScenarioTest.ComponentDummy, ExtendedScenarioTest.ComponentDummy2, FileSharingClient, GnpNetLayer, ServerNode, SimpleNetLayer
public interface Component

Basic interface for all components of a host (=end node) in a distributed system. Components can be single layers (network, transport etc.) or subcomponents inside of layers (overlay components or similar). Instances of the component interfaces should always be created via appropriate ComponentFactory implementation

Version:
3.0, 03.12.2007
Author:
Konstantin Pussep, Sebastian Kaune
See Also:
de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.common
